citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:30 p.m. on
19-Dec-17. In addition to waiting 30 minutes, I honked the vehicle horn and knocked on the door and no responsible
adult was available.
This report will be sent by regular mail.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:30 p.m. on
19-Dec-17. In addition to waiting 30 minutes, I honked the vehicle horn and knocked on the door and no responsible
adult was available.  
This report will be sent by regular mail.
